description:
After being lectured about their studies by their mother, Komari and Natsumi meet up with Renge to pay a visit to Hotaru`s house. Unaware of this, Hotaru has been busy making plushies modeled after her beloved Komari-senpai. Just as she`s pondering where she should put them all, the doorbell rings...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Became a Ghost and Tried Hard
Ich bin ein Geist geworden und habe mich angestrengt
おばけになってがんばった
